DOC.brief_title: 10 Year Outcome Total Knee Replacement ( TKR ) Using Sigma Prosthesis
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective database set October 1998 . Patient detail collect pre-operatively , intra-operatively immediately post operatively . Patients follow dedicated knee clinic 6 month , 18 month , 3 year 5 year . Data SF12 American knee society score do visit .
DOC.criteria: All patient undergoing total knee replacement Fife
